org.ardenus.audio

Interface SoundListener


  • public interface SoundListener
    Used to listen for events related to sounds.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void onSoundBufferUpdate(Sound sound, Resource resource, AudioCodec codec)
      Called when a sound's buffer update has been updated to a new one.
      default void onSoundDestroy(Sound sound)
      Called when a sound has been destroyed.
      default void onSoundEvent(Sound sound, int id, int repeatIndex)
      Called when a sound event has been triggered.
      default void onSoundFade(Sound sound, float volume, long fadeTime, boolean stopAfterFade)
      Called when a sound begins to fade to a certain volume.
      default void onSoundFinalize(Sound sound)
      Called when a sound has been finalized.
      default void onSoundInit(Sound sound)
      Called when a sound has been initialized.
      default void onSoundPause(Sound sound, boolean bufferUpdate)
      Called when a sound has been paused.
      default void onSoundPlay(Sound sound, boolean bufferUpdate)
      Called when a sound has started playing.
      default void onSoundSetConeInnerAngle(Sound sound, org.joml.Vector3f innerAngle, org.joml.Vector3f oldInnerAngle)
      Called when a sound's cone inner angle has been changed.
      default void onSoundSetConeOuterAngle(Sound sound, org.joml.Vector3f outerAngle, org.joml.Vector3f oldOuterAngle)
      Called when a sound's cone outer angle has been changed.

      Called when a sound's cone outer gain has been changed.

      Called when a sound's direction has been changed.
      default void onSoundSetLooping(Sound sound, boolean looping, boolean wasLooping)
      Called when a sound's looping state has been changed.

      Called when a sound's pitch has been changed.

      Called when a sound's position has been changed.

      Called when a sound's velocity has been changed.
      default void onSoundSetVolume(Sound sound, float volume, float oldVolume)
      Called when a sound's volume has been changed.
      default void onSoundStop(Sound sound)
      Called when the sound has been stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • onSoundBufferUpdate

        default void onSoundBufferUpdate(Sound sound,
                                 Resource resource,
                                 AudioCodec codec)
        Called when a sound's buffer update has been updated to a new one.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound that had it's buffer updated.
        resource - the new sound buffer.
        codec - the audio codec of the new sound buffer.

      • onSoundInit

        default void onSoundInit(Sound sound)
        Called when a sound has been initialized.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound that has been initialized.

      • onSoundEvent

        default void onSoundEvent(Sound sound,
                          int id,
                          int repeatIndex)
        Called when a sound event has been triggered.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound that the event belongs to.
        id - the ID of the event.
        repeatIndex - the repeat index if the sound event is a repeating sound event.

      • onSoundSetPosition

        default void onSoundSetPosition(Sound sound,
                                org.joml.Vector3f position,
                                org.joml.Vector3f oldPosition)
        Called when a sound's position has been changed.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.
        position - the new position.
        oldPosition - the old position.

      • onSoundSetVelocity

        default void onSoundSetVelocity(Sound sound,
                                org.joml.Vector3f velocity,
                                org.joml.Vector3f oldVelocity)
        Called when a sound's velocity has been changed.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.
        velocity - the new velocity.
        oldVelocity - the old velocity.

      • onSoundSetVolume

        default void onSoundSetVolume(Sound sound,
                              float volume,
                              float oldVolume)
        Called when a sound's volume has been changed.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.
        volume - the new volume.
        oldVolume - the old volume.

      • onSoundSetConeInnerAngle

        default void onSoundSetConeInnerAngle(Sound sound,
                                      org.joml.Vector3f innerAngle,
                                      org.joml.Vector3f oldInnerAngle)
        Called when a sound's cone inner angle has been changed.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.
        innerAngle - the new cone inner angle.
        oldInnerAngle - the old cone inner angle.

      • onSoundSetConeOuterAngle

        default void onSoundSetConeOuterAngle(Sound sound,
                                      org.joml.Vector3f outerAngle,
                                      org.joml.Vector3f oldOuterAngle)
        Called when a sound's cone outer angle has been changed.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.
        outerAngle - the new cone outer angle.
        oldOuterAngle - the old cone outer angle.

      • onSoundSetPitch

        default void onSoundSetPitch(Sound sound,
                             float pitch,
                             float oldPitch)
        Called when a sound's pitch has been changed.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.
        pitch - the new pitch.
        oldPitch - the old pitch.

      • onSoundSetDirection

        default void onSoundSetDirection(Sound sound,
                                 org.joml.Vector3f direction,
                                 org.joml.Vector3f oldDirection)
        Called when a sound's direction has been changed.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.
        direction - the new direction.
        oldDirection - the old direction.

      • onSoundSetLooping

        default void onSoundSetLooping(Sound sound,
                               boolean looping,
                               boolean wasLooping)
        Called when a sound's looping state has been changed.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.
        looping - true if the sound is now looping, false otherwise.
        wasLooping - true if the sound was looping, false otherwise.

      • onSoundSetConeOuterGain

        default void onSoundSetConeOuterGain(Sound sound,
                                     org.joml.Vector3f outerGain,
                                     org.joml.Vector3f oldOuterGain)
        Called when a sound's cone outer gain has been changed.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.
        outerGain - the new cone outer gain.
        oldOuterGain - the old cone outer gain.

      • onSoundPlay

        default void onSoundPlay(Sound sound,
                         boolean bufferUpdate)
        Called when a sound has started playing.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.
        bufferUpdate - true if the sound was started due to a buffer update, false otherwise.

      • onSoundPause

        default void onSoundPause(Sound sound,
                          boolean bufferUpdate)
        Called when a sound has been paused.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.
        bufferUpdate - true if the sound was paused due to a buffer update, false otherwise.

      • onSoundFade

        default void onSoundFade(Sound sound,
                         float volume,
                         long fadeTime,
                         boolean stopAfterFade)
        Called when a sound begins to fade to a certain volume.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.
        volume - the volume the sound is going to fade to.
        fadeTime - how long it will take in milliseconds for the sound to fade.
        stopAfterFade - true if the sound will stop after the fading has completed, false.

      • onSoundStop

        default void onSoundStop(Sound sound)
        Called when the sound has been stopped.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.

      • onSoundDestroy

        default void onSoundDestroy(Sound sound)
        Called when a sound has been destroyed.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.

      • onSoundFinalize

        default void onSoundFinalize(Sound sound)
        Called when a sound has been finalized.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound.
